about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: [ ABOUT ME ]
about.bio: I'm a passionate Fullstack JavaScript and Mobile Developer with nearly 4 years of experience building impactful applications. I love solving challenges and crafting meaningful user experiences. My focus: building scalable, intuitive, and future-ready digital products.

projects.title: Selected Work
projects.subtitle: [ SELECTED WORK ]
projects.description: My projects are currently under development. Come back soon to discover my work!

1.description: Building modern web and mobile applications with advanced features like real-time updates, secure payments, and CI/CD automation.

2.description: Developing scalable web/mobile apps using React, Flutter, Node.js, and gRPC.

3.description: Built a streaming platform for manga reading using ReactJS.

4.description: Designed and deployed a construction management platform with React + Node.

5.description: Built a desktop app for sales management (Delphi + SQL Server).

contact.title: Let's create something remarkable together
contact.subtitle: [ CONTACT ]
contact.description: Collaborate with me to craft exceptional designs that reflect your unique vision.
